mapper.insert: insert into board (boardId, memberId, title, content, boardListId) values (#{boardId},#{memberId},#{title},#{content},#{boardListId})
insert into comment (commentId, boardId, content) values (#{commentId},#{boardId},#{content})
mapper.select: select boardId, memberId, title, content, hit, createdDate from board where boardListId = 1 order by boardID desc
